snippet.title: BMX Tunnel Run
snippet.description: Jake and Peter discover an abandoned mine and starting racing their BMX bikes in the forgotten tunnels at night, encountering a group of hostile riders and unexpected ground tremors, as Peter confronts issues in his personal life.

snippet.title: Dave Mirra: BMX Superstar
snippet.description: Profiles Dave Mirra, a native New Yorker and a bicycle motocross champion, focusing on the tricks and stunts he performs at the X-Games and other competitions.

snippet.title: Freestyle BMX \- Page 15
snippet.description: Superstar rider Dave turned pro at the age of eighteen and soon became the master of BMX vert riding. The following ... In 1996, just three years after his accident, the so-called Miracle Boy won his first X Games gold medal. He holds the X ...

snippet.title: Game Boy Advance Secret Codes
snippet.description: BradyGames Game Boy Advance Secret Codes is the ultimate pocket guide to the best cheats, tricks and secret codes for the hottest and most popular games released for the Game Boy Advance.

snippet.title: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2 Official Strategy Guide
snippet.description: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX 2 features exciting new elements including an improved storyline, 3 new riders, realistic special effects, interactive objects like cars, boats, helicopters, and an all-new trick morpher.

snippet.title: SPIN - Dec 2001 - Page 141
snippet.description: TAKING OVER ALL SYSTEMS GAME BOY® ADVANCE The most wanted game on PlayStation® game console is now ripping its way across Game Boy® Advance. PC and ... Now you can ride like the King of BMX on your choice of systems.

snippet.title: Innovation and Marketing in the Video Game Industry: ... - Page 80
snippet.description: It wasn't until Nintendo launched its Game Boy in 1989 that handheld consoles became a mainstream part of gaming culture. ... bundled with California Games, a popular sports title that featured skateboarding, Frisbee, surfing and BMX biking.

snippet.title: Boys' Life - Aug 2002 - Page 8
snippet.description: The latest word on the latest games THE NINTENDO GAMECUBE/ GAME BOY ADVANCE CABLE A unique innovation to gaming, Nintendo's link cable ... Like Pro BMX, smooth controls and wicked tricks can't maintain long-term interest.

snippet.title: It's How You Play the Game: A Novel - Page 22
snippet.description: A Novel Jimmy Gleacher. At that point a high-pitched voice came from behind me saying, “Who're you talking to?” I turned my head to see a young boy straddling a silver BMX bike. “A friend of mine, but he's not here right now.” “Where is he?
